类 DBController

    • PixivCookbook.Controller.DBController

extends java.lang.Object
    this is the interface class dealing with database
    作者:
    Ling Wei, Shen Yu, Chen Sihan

      • getConnect

        public java.sql.Connection getConnect()

      • setConnect

        public void setConnect​(java.sql.Connection connect)

      • run

        public void run()

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addRecipetoDatabase

        public void addRecipetoDatabase​(Recipe input,
                                int id)
        参数:
        input -
        id - insert a given recipe to database always use with assinID function which given the max id of recipes in database and insert the recipe as the (maxID+1) recipe

      • assignID

        public int assignID()
        assign ID for new recipe
        返回:
        the largest current ID

      • deleteRecipefromDatabase

        public void deleteRecipefromDatabase​(int id)
        参数:
        id - delete recipe by id

      • addIngredientstoDatabase

        public void addIngredientstoDatabase​(java.util.List<Ingredient> input,
                                     int id)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        参数:
        input - the list of ingredient
        id - the recipe id
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - delete all ingredients first and insert into database a new one

      • addStepstoDatabase

        public void addStepstoDatabase​(java.util.List<Step> input,
                               int id)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException
        参数:
        input - // the list of step of the recipe
        id - // the recpie id
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - add steps to the given recipe

      • saveRecipName

        public void saveRecipName​(int id,
                          java.lang.String newName)
        参数:
        id - the recipe id
        newName - the new name update the recipe name to be the given one

      • saveDescription

        public void saveDescription​(int id,
                            java.lang.String newDescription)
        参数:
        id - recipe id
        newDescription - the new descrition of recipe update the description of the given recipe

      • saveServings

        public void saveServings​(int id,
                         double newserving)
        参数:
        id - the recipe id
        newserving - the new serving update the serving of the given recipe

      • savePreparationtime

        public void savePreparationtime​(int id,
                                int newPreparationtime)
        参数:
        id - the recipe id
        newPreparationtime - the new Preparation time update the time of the given recipe

      • saveCooktime

        public void saveCooktime​(int id,
                         int newCooktime)
        参数:
        id - the recipe id
        newCooktime - the new cook time

      • saveImagePath

        public void saveImagePath​(int id,
                          java.lang.String newPath)
        参数:
        id - the recipe id
        newPath - the new path of the recipe

      • getAllRecipeNamesfromDatabase

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllRecipeNamesfromDatabase()
        返回:
        all the recipe names in the database as a list

      • getRecipeBySearchfromDatabase

        public Recipe getRecipeBySearchfromDatabase​(int id)
        参数:
        id - the id contained by the recipe that we are looking for
        返回:
        the recipe

      • getIngredientsfromDatabase

        public java.util.List<Ingredient> getIngredientsfromDatabase​(int id)
        参数:
        id - the id contained by ingredients that we are looking for
        返回:
        a list of ingredients

      • getStepsfromDatabase

        public java.util.List<Step> getStepsfromDatabase​(int id)
        参数:
        id - the id contained by steps that we are looking for
        返回:
        a list of steps

      • searchAllMatchedRecipes

        public java.util.List<Recipe> searchAllMatchedRecipes​(java.lang.String RecipeName)
                                               throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        参数:
        RecipeName -
        返回:
        the list of id
        抛出:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • getIDbyName

        public int getIDbyName​(java.lang.String RecipeName)
        参数:
        RecipeName -
        返回:
        the id the recipe name matches to

      • searchAllMatchedID

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> searchAllMatchedID​(java.lang.String RecipeName)
                                                     throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        参数:
        RecipeName -
        返回:
        a list of matched recipes with given names
        抛出:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • getRecipesForMainPage

        public java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipesForMainPage()
        返回:
        the random 7 recipes name for the main page if less than 7 return all

      • addForbiddenPair

        public void addForbiddenPair​(java.lang.String p1,
                             java.lang.String p2)
        参数:
        p1 - ForbidIngredient1
        p2 - ForbidIngredient2

      • getForbiddenPair

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getForbiddenPair​(java.lang.String p1)
        参数:
        p1 -
        返回:
        the list that the given ingredient cannot match

      • getAllForbiddenPair

        public java.util.LinkedList<ForbiddenPair> getAllForbiddenPair()
        返回:
        a list of all forbidden pairs

      • deleteAllForbiddenPair

        public void deleteAllForbiddenPair()
        delete all forbidden pairs
